backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing blogs, user profiles, and email-based admin permissions with access-control checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping logo-related updates to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files, including marketing components, pages, and static assets.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide describing prerequisites and steps for building and deploying the app to a local replica or the IC mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode variants, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file setting page metadata and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, global providers, and shared layout with header and footer.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Component enforcing admin access using Internet Identity, allowlist checks, and loading/auth states.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity and clears React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/cursor/CustomCur: Empty placeholder component with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/forms/StudentEnq: Handles student enquiry form with validation and generates WhatsApp, SMS, and email follow‑up actions after submission.
frontend/src/components/forms/TeacherEnq: Handles teacher enquiry form with multi-select fields and generates WhatsApp, SMS, and email follow‑up actions once submitted.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Implements a contact form with email validation, error handling, and a thank-you state after simulated submission.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Market: Renders marketing footer with logo, navigation links, and contact options including WhatsApp and email.
Renders site header with navigation links, responsive mobile menu, and logo handling.
frontend/src/components/marketing/sectio: Renders a contact section with WhatsApp, phone, SMS, and email actions using links and buttons.
Displays an accordion list of FAQ items sourced from site content.
Provides the landing hero with headline, CTA buttons, feature highlights, and a hero image.
Shows a four‑step explanation of the service workflow using cards and icons.
Lists tutoring services by subject with icons and descriptions.
Displays student testimonials with ratings and author details.
Shows trust statistics like experience, students taught, and teacher count with icons.
Highlights key value propositions such as expert tutors, personalization, flexibility, and results.
frontend/src/content/legalContent.ts: Defines the Terms & Conditions content structure including sections, titles, and last‑updated info.
frontend/src/content/marketingContent.ts: Defines marketing content including hero text, value propositions, services, steps, testimonials, and FAQ data for the site.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Provides contact info, social links, form option lists, trust stats, testimonials, and FAQ data for site configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomCursor.ts: Empty placeholder hook file for custom cursor functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Hook to set the document title and meta description on page load.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for blog operations and user profile/admin checks using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, dark mode variables, base styles, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Provides utilities to generate WhatsApp, SMS, phone, and email links along with prefilled messages for students and teachers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBlogsPage.tsx: Admin interface for creating, editing, publishing, and deleting blog posts.
frontend/src/pages/AdminSetupPage.tsx: Admin setup flow to validate identity, save email, and activate admin access using a bootstrap token.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Displays a single blog post with metadata, loading states, and fallback for unpublished posts.
frontend/src/pages/BlogsPage.tsx: Lists all published blog posts with previews and navigation to individual posts.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page offering WhatsApp, phone, SMS, and email options with auto-generated links.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page assembling marketing sections and setting SEO metadata.
Renders the marketing landing page layout and sets the page title and meta description on mount.
frontend/src/pages/SetupChecklistPage.ts: Displays a configurable setup checklist with statuses and details for site configuration items.
frontend/src/pages/StudentFormPage.tsx: Sets meta tags and renders the student enquiry form page layout.
frontend/src/pages/TeacherFormPage.tsx: Sets meta tags and renders the teacher registration form page layout.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Displays terms and conditions content using legalContent with page metadata configuration.
frontend/src/types/backend-augment.d.ts: Extends the backend interface with an internal admin initialization method for access control.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/static/growwithtutor-standalone: Standalone static HTML landing page with sections for hero, services, workflow, testimonials, FAQ, and contact.
Explains the standalone static landing page files and how to run them locally.
Defines editable content data for the standalone landing page including hero text, services, steps, testimonials, and FAQs.
Defines global styles, color variables, layout, and responsive components for the standalone marketing page including header, hero, and buttons.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, fonts, animations, and container settings for the project.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, feature requirements, and issues related to updating branding with a provided logo URL.
